Join us at International Women's Day (IWD'19), on 10th of April in Just Crafted. We start at 6:00 p.m. Inspiring talks, time for networking and surprises included! We'll post more details about presentations, speakers and agenda soon.

Bring your friends with you! Great atmosphere guaranteed.

IWD is a series of events organised by Women Techmakers communities launched by Google all over the world. The main theme of the meetups is #IamRemarkable. Its Google's initiative which aims at supporting and motivating women to develop and celebrate their own achievements.

What makes you remarkable? Stop and think for a while about the answer.

events.name: I/O Extended 2019 Lublin
events.description:
This yearâ€™s developer festival will be held May 7-9 at the Shoreline Amphitheatre in Mountain View, CA

I/O brings together developers from around the globe for talks, hands-on learning with Google experts, and the first look at Googleâ€™s latest developer products.

Let's watch together the live stream from the most important conference of the year!

events.name: Evening Web Talk by GDG Lublin
events.description:
Hey! On the 23rd of May, we're organising the Evening Web Talk. Come and meet our special guest - Doug Sillars from Seattle. He will share his experience about best practices to optimize the delivery of your video to your customers. The second speaker is Igor Chulinda from DataArt who will talk about Object-Oriented Reactive Programming. Abstracts and agenda below ğŸ‘‡

Join us!

TOPICS & SPEAKERS
Video Killed My Data Plan: Delivering video that doesn't break the bank, Doug Sillars.

Video is one of the fastest growing mediums on the web and in mobile applications. Video files have been shown to increase engagement and can be a great way to deliver your message quickly. (And who doesnâ€™t love animated GIFs?)

However, a video that takes a long time to start up leads to frustration and abandonment. The same goes for the video that stalls during playback. In this talk, youâ€™ll learn best practices to optimize the delivery of your video to your customers, ensuring fast delivery and minimizing stalls for great customer experience.

Doug Sillars
Doug is is a freelance mobile performance expert, having helped thousands of developers speed up their mobile apps and websites. A Google Developer Expert and the author of Oâ€™Reillyâ€™s â€œHigh-Performance Android Apps,â€ Doug regularly speaks at conferences, and blogs at dougsillars.com. He is currently working as a freelance digital nomad, travelling with his family in Europe.
________________________________

Object-Oriented Reactive Programming, Igor Chulinda (DataArt)
This talk is about a generic concept for the representation of your app's data/state â€“ as a virtual, relational graph. This paradigm is a key (or at least very important) building block in libraries like MobX, Vue, Aurelia, $mol, MetaF.
I will cover:
1. A high-level implementation overview of Object Oriented Reactive Programming in JavaScript,
2. Comparison to Functional Reactive Programming,
3. And the answer to the question: "Is it possible to combine Object-Oriented and Functional Programming?â€

Igor Chulinda
Born in Ukraine, lives in Poland. Senior full-stack developer (JS and .NET). Huge fan of TypeScript, node.js, OpenAPI. One of ts-jest contributors. Maintainer of baset.
Spent the first six years of his career in small start-ups at the initial phase as a Lead Engineer/Team Lead/Tech Lead/CTO. For the last 3 years has been working at DataArt as a JS developer.

events.name: Åšniadanie z Women Techmakers
events.description:
Wstajesz wczeÅ›nie? Lubisz produktywne poranki? InteresujÄ… ciÄ™ sposoby na pobudzenie kreatywnoÅ›ci? Spotkajmy siÄ™ w luÅºnej atmosferze na Å›niadaniu z Women Techmakers, 12 czerwca w Kawiarni Heca. WspÃ³lnie odpowiemy na pytanie, czy kreatywnoÅ›ci moÅ¼na siÄ™ nauczyÄ‡. Startujemy o 7:30! Kawa i twÃ³rczy nastrÃ³j gwarantowane.

Przy Å›niadaniu porozmawiamy o rÃ³Å¼nych aspektach kreatywnoÅ›ci, takich jak:

- umiejÄ™tnoÅ›Ä‡ odnajdywania moÅ¼liwoÅ›ci w pozornie trudnych sytuacjach,
- znaczenie utrzymywania relacji z ludÅºmi dookoÅ‚a nas,
- eksperymentowanie.

Zastanowimy siÄ™ rÃ³wnieÅ¼ jak odpowiednio zaplanowaÄ‡ swojÄ… Å›cieÅ¼kÄ™ zawodowÄ… i dlaczego popeÅ‚nianie bÅ‚Ä™dÃ³w siÄ™ opÅ‚aca.

OprÃ³cz rozmowy i lifehackÃ³w â€“ Ä‡wiczenie na kreatywnoÅ›Ä‡. Poszerzymy granice wyobraÅºni i nauczymy siÄ™, jak czerpaÄ‡ inspiracjÄ™ z otaczajÄ…cego Å›wiata.

Kto wstanie? ;)

-----

[EN]

Do you get up early? Do you like productive mornings? Are you interested in ways of boosting creativity? Let's meet in a relaxed atmosphere at breakfast with Women Techmakers, on June 12th in Heca Cafe. Together, we'll try to answer the question if creativity is possible to learn. We start at 7:30! Coffee and inspiration guaranteed.

During breakfast, we'll talk about various aspects of creativity, such as:

- the ability to find opportunities in seemingly difficult situations,
- the importance of relations with people around us,
- experimenting.

Also, we'll focus on how to plan the career properly and think about why making mistakes is a good thing.

Apart from chatting and a bunch of lifehacks, we'll exercise creativity. We'll try to extend the boards of imagination and learn how to take inspiration from the world around us.

Who's gonna wake up? ;)
